title: LeaverBuster for Riot problems...
body: I've Disconnected 2 times back to back  exactly right after champion select, it would display "Please Reconnect" but for the love of me it wouldn't reconnect no matter what. But every other online game would run fine. I went to the board page and noticed a lot of people were posting about the same issue. For this reason I feel like the Leaver Buster I got for this should be excused for it was more of Riot's problem then me on purposely leaving games -.-

replies.body: It sucks that you've been getting re-connection errors back to back and got a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) as a result.  I appreciate you trying to get back in-game, but leaverbuster treats all leaves equally because of the negative experiences it causes others.  Your best bet would be to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is blocking you from reaching the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
